news.title: RSS feeds of news and event announcements available
news.body:
Our web team has created automatic RSS feeds for news and upcoming events. Feeds are focus and language dependent.
The URL for the news feed is http://www.focus.fsfeurope.org/news/news.language.rss, while you find the event feed at http://www.focus.fsfeurope.org/events/events.language.rss. For example, for German speaking news and the German focus, you would choose http://www.germany.fsfeurope.org/events/events.de.rss.
For your convenience, the news and event pages contain links to the RSS feed URLs.
